intent_atoms.description: The system must always maintain accurate fragment parsing and validation for traf/tfhd/tfdt/trun fragments.
Fragment coverage expansion with multi-trun, negative data_offset, composition offset, and missing tfdt fixtures is now documented in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/138_Fragment_Fixture_Coverage/Fragment_Fiber...

functional_units.name: Fragment Run Parsing and Validation
functional_units.description: Parses, validates, and exports fragment run data for traf/tfhd/tfdt/trun fragments.

functional_units.name: Fragment Coverage Expansion Documentation
functional_units.description: Provides expanded coverage of multi-trun, negative data_offset, composition offset, and missing tfdt scenarios with verification details.

functional_units.name: Downstream Validator and CLI Polish Intake
functional_units.description: Evaluates and queues downstream validator and CLI polish tasks that consume new fragment summaries once additional DASH/HLS fixtures are available.

functional_units.name: Real-World Fixture Acquisition for Codecs
functional_units.description: Acquires real-world media fixtures for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, MPEG-H to replace synthetic payloads and refresh snapshot baselines after licensing clearance.
